title: Understanding the Power of a Product Rule
text: The power of a product rule states that when you have a product raised to a power, you apply the exponent to each factor in the product.

title: Applying the Power to Individual Factors
text: For an expression like $${\left(x y\right)}^n$$, apply the exponent $$n$$ to both $$x$$ and $$y$$, resulting in $$x^n y^n$$.

title: Finding the Power on Each Base
text: What is $$a^3$$ when applying the exponent $$3$$ to a?

title: Finding the Power on Each Base
text: What does $${\left(b^2\right)}^3$$ simplify to when applying the exponent $$3$$ to $$b^2$$?

title: Combining the Results
text: Combine the results of raising each base to the power individually.
